name: PianoDiscProdigy
0:
”Alexa, tell my piano shuffle all songs.”
”Alexa, ask my piano to play the song piano man.”
”Alexa, ask my piano set the volume to twenty.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my piano
des: This skill allows you to play music from the Prodigy II's SD card with your voice. You can play, pause, resume, stop skip and even adjust volume.
